property.description: If selected code for parameter checking is included in the build.

constraint.display: Unique name required for each instance
Requires lower level Motor Speed module implementation
Requires lower level Motor Current module implementation
Name must be a valid C symbol

property.constraint: eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_encoder.f_over_current}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_encoder.f_over_voltage}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_encoder.f_over_speed}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_encoder.f_low_voltage}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

property.description: A user callback function. If this callback function is provided, it is called at speed control cyclic interrupt.

constraint.display: Name must be a valid C symbol
